pr_title: Add custom domain support to callable functions

timeline.message: Add custom domain support to callable functions
Add test for domains with path

timeline.bodyText:
I think we can just use the standard library URL class and do new URL(regionOrCustomDomain) and then catch MalformedUrlException:
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/net/URL.html#URL(java.lang.String)
Not quite as good as what you have but worth saving a whole dependency.
timeline.author: samtstern

timeline.bodyText: If you look at the iOS and JS PRs we set region to the default value here.  This is needed in case the person calls useEmulator
timeline.author: samtstern

timeline.bodyText: See my comment below, but add a test about using useEmulator with a custom domain.  I think it would fail right now.
timeline.author: samtstern

timeline.bodyText: Nit: you could just move this logic inside of the try/catch and not need isRegion at all.  But totally fine either way.
timeline.author: samtstern

replies.bodyText:
Since region and customDomain are final they can't be set both in the try and the catch.
I'm gussing that Java considers the whole try and not just the lines that could cause the exception.
replies.author: kroikie
